content:
<rule id="javaee-technology-usage-00927" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile as="xml-file" matches="//p:faces-config/@version[windup:matches(self::node(), '{v}')]">
                    <namespace prefix="p" uri="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL" version="{v}">JSF XML</technology-tag>
            </perform>
            <where param="v">
                <matches pattern="(2.2|2.3)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
